quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better. – Ralph Waldo Emerson
fact: The Michelin man is known as Mr. Bib. His name was Bibendum in the company’s first ads in 1896.
joke: I don't trust sushi, there's something fishy about it.
